meanings.sent1: The pawky fox outsmarted the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent2: She gave him a pawky smile, knowing she had tricked him.
meanings.sent3: The pawky raccoon stole the picnic basket when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: His pawky plan to sneak past the guard worked like a charm.
meanings.sent5: The pawky detective solved the case with clever thinking.

meanings.sent1: The pawky kitten played with a ball of yarn for hours.
meanings.sent2: Her pawky sense of humor always brought smiles to everyone around her.
meanings.sent3: The pawky puppy kept hiding his owner's shoes just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The pawky squirrel teased the birds by stealing their seeds.
meanings.sent5: Their pawky antics brightened up the dull afternoon.
